ai-patthana18.6:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.6:0.3_0: persuading the shade of the fetters, etc., which covers the shadow of the fetters,
ai-patthana18.6:1.1_0: For one who does not conceive it for the sake of perception, not for the sake of sacrifice.
ai-patthana18.6:3.1_0: for the sake of fun, not for the sake of submitting.
ai-patthana18.6:5.1_0: for the sake of repulsion, not for the sake of a misfortune, conditioned.
ai-patthana18.6:7.1_0: It’s because of disrespect that teaching doesn’t give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.6:9.1_0: for the sake of a hindrance ...
